name: Paintball Party 2
description:
Paintball Party 2 is a multiplayer action platformer for all ages. There are currently 4 multiplayer game modes which can be played with up to 4 players in split-screen mode. The game also supports network play for up to 16 players.

The game includes 16 characters and 4 levels to play on. Additional levels and characters can be added to the game easily. The legacy character and level packs include all of the characters and levels submitted to us by players of the original game.
